iscream 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Region operations

    region_map()
    Run a defined function over genomic regions
    query_all()
    Make a bsseq object of CpGs from input genomic regions

    Multithreading

    get_threads()
    Get the number of available threads
    set_threads()
    Set the number of available threads

    Experimental

    decode_beta()
    Beta value decoder
    decode_cov()
    Coverage value decoder
    decode_m()
    M value decoder
    decoder()
    Get decoded values
    joiner()
    Cpg and sample joiner
    make_beta_mat()
    Beta matrix
    make_bsseq_hm()
    Make a BSSeq object
    make_bsseq_lm()
    Make a BSSeq object using less memory
    make_coverage_mat()
    Cov matrix
    make_m_mat()
    M value matrix
    make_meth_mat()
    Methylation matrix
    make_sparse_mat()
    Sparse Methylation matrix
    make_sparse_mat_bs()
    BSSeq Sparse Methylation matrix
    read_sample()
    Sample reader
    read_sample_bs()
    BSSeq Sample reader

    Vector Decoder
    vdouble_decoder()
    Double Vector Decoder
